channel.title: Changing 562 teleport.. NAMES
channel.description: Okay, well. In 562 servers you have teleport names. I was wondering if anyone knew how to change the NAME of teleports. Not the location of where to tele to - but what file to open to change the NAMES. Thanks :]

item.title: Changing 562 teleport.. NAMES
item.dc:creator: @No_Life2 No Life
item.description:
@No_Life2 wrote:

Easy. Just change the second ID number to an integer with a value of 1.

The first ID number get from a 317 source that has those tele names as changeable text. (e.g. textHandler.java)

Boom, 562 renamed teles.

Your welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing 562 teleport.. NAMES
item.dc:creator: @10thDimensionStaff 10thDimensionStaff
item.description:
@10thDimensionStaff wrote:

That file handles packet id’s for buttons that have been clicked by the user. It doesn’t replace the text of a teleport’s name such as: “Varrock Teleport”

I have looked everywhere in the source code, to no avail.

Do you know of the sendString("", ID1, ID2); numbers needed? If you do, that I can just add in the following to the the 562’s process method:

sendString(“Renamed Teleport”, IDNum, IDNum2);

I just need to figure out what those ID’s are to replace the teleport names.

And if you were pro at 562’s the server’s you released would have had these teleport names changed already. I guess you’re good at programming 562’s, but surely are not a pro at them.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing 562 teleport.. NAMES
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

Sorry… I’m pro with 562 xD, I never saw this though lol, ActionButtonPacketHandler.java ,

yhuu can find it by:

yourserverfiles>com>rs2hd>packethandler>ActionButtonPacketHandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Changing 562 teleport.. NAMES
item.dc:creator: @10thDimensionStaff 10thDimensionStaff
item.description:
@10thDimensionStaff wrote:

…seriously…why does everyone always ignore this question…

I KNOW! GRAVEDIG! SUE ME!
